metadata.name: "The Dusty Art"
metadata.description:
This is my favorite color collection from the souls of Western-Ghats, in the reserves of the Malampuzha Dam. This is a picture where you can feel heat of sun from the dust created by the driving the Auto-Rikshaw of India, the poor mans choice of transport. 
These Golden light of Sun on the dust so, "The Dusty Art". 
This has been published in several regions in the country also got first national level recognition in photography, got FIP (Federation of Indian Photography) Gold medal in the 'Color Prints' section and also 'Acceptance' for my pictures in the "8th All India Saloon of Photography 2019" organized by "Image Photographic Association Palakkad". 
Also published in the Kerala Tourism Coffee-table book by Govt. of Kerala, by FrontEnd Media Publications.
